body.p: Cloudberry Database offers two different methods for text search and analytics, Cloudberry Database full text search and Tanzu Cloudberry Text.

section.title: Cloudberry Database Full Text Search
section.p: Cloudberry Database text search is PostgreSQL text search ported to the Cloudberry Database MPP platform. Cloudberry Database text search is immediately available to you, with no need to install and maintain additional software. For full details on this topic, see Cloudberry Database text search.

section.title: Tanzu Cloudberry Text
section.p: For advanced text analysis applications, VMWare also offers Tanzu Cloudberry Text, which integrates Cloudberry Database with the Apache Solr text search platform. Tanzu Cloudberry Text installs an Apache Solr cluster alongside your Cloudberry Database cluster and provides Cloudberry Database functions you can use to create Solr indexes, query them, and receive results in the database session.

Both of these systems provide powerful, enterprise-quality document indexing and searching services. Tanzu Greeenplum Text, with Solr, has many capabilities that are not available with Cloudberry Database text search. In particular, Tanzu Cloudberry Text is better for advanced text analysis applications. For a comparative between these methods, see Comparing Cloudberry Database Text Search with Tanzu Cloudberry Text.
